settings.subtitle: Storycopter is actively looking for test pilots. Interested? Email us at storycopter@gmail.com
settings.text: This website has been built using Storycopter—a set of sophisticated tools to create, manage and publish interactive documentaries on The Web. It’s an open-source project developed by Piotr Fedorczyk, Joanna Bogusz, Laurian Gridinoc and Mark Boas. Out.
settings.title: Read back
